name: Ringscape
description:
DOWNLOAD NOW ON GOOGLE PLAY STORE

Stuck in traffic? Bored? Waiting? Taking a break?

Presenting you a hyper-casual game with mechanics which can't get any more simple. One-tap your way to the highest score and avoid hitting the rings with the ball. Your timing determines your skill! 
And of course, the game is free from all sorts of advertisements!

Not just that, you get to play two different game-modes that are crafted for your mood.

Relax Mode: 
Sit back and enjoy the slow chillwave music while dodging the rings.

Restless Mode: 
Buckle up and get ready to rush your way through the rings while dubstep music intensifies!
